Build comprehensive home security solution for 2822 Clune Ave Venice.

## Requirements:
- **Google Home integration** - Connect with existing Google Home devices
- **Native Jules alerts** - Text-to-Jules from Google Home settings for warnings
- **Intelligent filtering** - Jules interprets which warnings to escalate to Ben vs silence

## Key Decisions Needed:

- Quiet hours handling (11pm-6am - escalate only for true emergencies)

tasks.title: üîí Implement FedRAMP High Security Protocols
tasks.description:
Implement comprehensive FedRAMP High security controls and compliance protocols for UP.FIT government/fleet deployments.

## Scope:
- FedRAMP High baseline controls implementation
- Security documentation and System Security Plan (SSP)
- Continuous monitoring and auditing capabilities
- Encryption at rest and in transit (FIPS 140-2 validated)
- Multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all administrative access
- Access control and least privilege enforcement
- Audit logging and retention (minimum 1 year)
- Incident response procedures
- Vulnerability scanning and remediation
- Penetration testing (annual)

## Relevant to:
- UP.FIT government fleet contracts
- LVMPD and other law enforcement deployments
- Federal procurement eligibility

## Priority Context:
High priority for federal/government sales pipeline. Required for contracts with federal agencies and many state/local government entities.

tasks.title: üë∂ KidSize App - Kids Clothing Size & Style Tracker
tasks.description:
iPhone + Android app for parents to share kids clothing sizes, preferences, and style photos.

## Core Value Prop:
Retain accurate sizing data for kids ‚Äî solves "what size is my kid now?" for everyone who buys them clothes.

## Key Features:
1. Parents store kids sizes (clothes, shoes) ‚Äî updated as they grow
2. Notes on what kids like/dont like
3. Upload photos of clothes and styles they like
4. **Killer feature:** Request sizing data from non-users (grandparents, co-parents) ‚Äî seamlessly enrolls them as guest profile without account
5. Affiliate revenue from shopping recommendations based on sizes + preferences

## Viral Loop:
- School parent groups + cousin circles = organic distribution
- Every sizing request = new user enrollment
- Birthday/holiday seasons = growth events

## Origin:
Maggies idea ‚Äî her friend network is the distribution channel. Parent groups at Auggies school are tight viral networks.

## Comparable:
BabyList, but focused on ongoing size tracking vs one-time registry.

## Revenue:
Affiliate commissions on clothing purchases (size-matched recommendations)

## Status:
MVP wireframes and tech stack in progress.
